comment.author: 84502700@N05
comment._content: I am wondering where this image was taken. It is not of the correct design to be of the trestle that was just to the west of Marlboro. Also, the number of cars would not be typical of the size of the locomotive on that branch line because of the grades.

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
comment.author: 25960495@N06
comment._content: We have no way of verifying the information that was with this photo. Perhaps someone will recognize the trestle someday and let us know its exact location.
comment.authorname: Keene and Cheshire County (NH) Historical Photos
